name: CFNetServiceBrowserFlags
desc: Flags that the system passes to net service browser callbacks.

items.name: init(rawValue: CFOptionFlags)
items.desc: Initializes a flag value with the specified bitfield.

items.name: static var isDefault: CFNetServiceBrowserFlags
items.desc: Specifies whether the resulting domain is the default registration or browse domain.

items.name: static var isDomain: CFNetServiceBrowserFlags
items.desc: Specifies whether the result pertains to a search for domains or services.

items.name: static var moreComing: CFNetServiceBrowserFlags
items.desc: A hint that the system will call the clientâ€™s callback function again soon.

items.name: static var remove: CFNetServiceBrowserFlags
items.desc: Specifies whether the client should remove the result instead of adding it.
